name: Logistic regression convergence analysis using Newton's Method.
tagline: This code implements Logistic Regression using Newton's Method in Python.
body:
This code implements Logistic Regression using Newton's Method in Python. The plot below shows the convergence results on the objective function of Logistic Regression.

![](https://github.com/deerishi/Logistic-Regression-Convergence-Analysis/blob/master/Objective%20Function.png?raw=True)
